segments.text: I want to find a book called Gone with the Wind.But I can't find it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me give you a hand.The author is ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I have been looking for it for a long time.Is this the latest edition ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have both the paperback and hardcover.which would you want to buy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the price of the hardcover ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little bit expensive , but I will buy one.This is $ 25 , here you are .
segments.speaker: S2
